trans-unit.source: Manages a related set of tab pages.
trans-unit.target: 管理一組相關的索引標籤頁。

trans-unit.source: A TabControl contains tab pages, which are represented by <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage> objects that you add through the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabControl.TabPages%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: TabControl 包含索引標籤頁，都由<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage>您透過加入物件<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabControl.TabPages%2A>屬性。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabControl.TabPages%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage>

trans-unit.source: The order of tab pages in this collection reflects the order the tabs appear in the control.
trans-unit.target: 在此集合中的索引標籤頁的順序會反映索引標籤控制項中顯示的順序。

trans-unit.source: The user can change the current <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage> by clicking one of the tabs in the control.
trans-unit.target: 使用者可以變更目前<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage>按一下其中一個索引標籤控制項中。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage>

trans-unit.source: You can also programmatically change the current <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage> by using one of the following TabControl properties: - <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabControl.SelectedIndex%2A> - <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabControl.SelectedTab%2A> In [!INCLUDE[dnprdnext](~/add/includes/dnprdnext-md.md)], you can also use one of the following methods: - <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabControl.SelectTab%2A> - <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabControl.DeselectTab%2A> In [!INCLUDE[dnprdnlong](~/add/includes/dnprdnlong-md.md)], you can respond when the current tab changes by handling one of the following events: - <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabControl.Deselecting> - <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabControl.Deselected> - <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabControl.Selecting> - <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabControl.Selected> The tabs in a TabControl are part of the TabControl, but not parts of the individual <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage> controls.
trans-unit.target: 您可以也以程式設計方式變更目前<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage>使用其中一種下列 TabControl 屬性:- <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabControl.SelectedIndex%2A>-<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabControl.SelectedTab%2A>中[!INCLUDE[dnprdnext](~/add/includes/dnprdnext-md.md)]，您也可以使用下列方法之一:- <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabControl.SelectTab%2A>-<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabControl.DeselectTab%2A>中[!INCLUDE[dnprdnlong](~/add/includes/dnprdnlong-md.md)]，目前的索引標籤變更來處理下列事件之一時，您可以回應:- <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabControl.Deselecting>- <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabControl.Deselected>- <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabControl.Selecting>- <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabControl.Selected>TabControl 中的索引標籤會 TabControl 的一部分，但不是個別的一部份<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage>控制項。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabControl.Selected> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabControl.Selecting> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabControl.Deselected> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabControl.Deselecting> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabControl.DeselectTab%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabControl.SelectTab%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabControl.SelectedTab%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabControl.SelectedIndex%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage>

trans-unit.source: Members of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage> class, such as the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ForeColor%2A> property, affect only the client rectangle of the tab page, but not the tabs.
trans-unit.target: 成員<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage>類別，例如<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ForeColor%2A>屬性，會影響只有用戶端矩形的索引標籤頁，但不是索引標籤。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ForeColor%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage>

trans-unit.source: Additionally, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Hide%2A> method of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage> will not hide the tab.
trans-unit.target: 此外，此<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Hide%2A>方法<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage>不會隱藏 [] 索引標籤</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage></xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Hide%2A>

trans-unit.source: To hide the tab, you must remove the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage> control from the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabControl.TabPages%2A?displayProperty=fullName> collection.
trans-unit.target: 若要隱藏 索引標籤，您必須移除<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage>控制項從<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabControl.TabPages%2A?displayProperty=fullName>集合。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabControl.TabPages%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage>

trans-unit.source: In [!INCLUDE[dnprdnlong](~/add/includes/dnprdnlong-md.md)], the tab is considered part of the tab page for determining when the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Enter> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Leave> events of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage> occur.
trans-unit.target: 在[!INCLUDE[dnprdnlong](~/add/includes/dnprdnlong-md.md)]，[] 索引標籤被視為屬於] 索引標籤頁面，以判斷何時<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Enter>和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Leave>事件<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage>發生。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Leave> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Enter>

trans-unit.source: In earlier versions of the .NET Framework, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Enter> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Leave> events of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage> do not occur when focus enters or leaves a tab, but only when focus enters or leaves the client rectangle of the tab page.
trans-unit.target: 在舊版的.NET Framework 中，<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Enter>和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Leave>事件<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage>不會發生當焦點進入或離開工作索引標籤，但唯有在焦點進入或離開索引標籤頁的用戶端矩形。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Leave> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Enter>

trans-unit.source: The following events are not raised for the TabControl class unless there is at least one <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage> in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabControl.TabPages%2A?displayProperty=fullName> collection: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Click?displayProperty=fullName>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.DoubleClick?displayProperty=fullName>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.MouseDown?displayProperty=fullName>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.MouseUp?displayProperty=fullName>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.MouseHover?displayProperty=fullName>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.MouseEnter?displayProperty=fullName>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.MouseLeave?displayProperty=fullName> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.MouseMove?displayProperty=fullName>.
trans-unit.target: 會引發下列事件不 TabControl 類別除非有至少一個<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage>中<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabControl.TabPages%2A?displayProperty=fullName>集合: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Click?displayProperty=fullName> <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.DoubleClick?displayProperty=fullName> <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.MouseDown?displayProperty=fullName> <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.MouseUp?displayProperty=fullName> <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.MouseHover?displayProperty=fullName> <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.MouseEnter?displayProperty=fullName>、<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.MouseLeave?displayProperty=fullName>和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.MouseMove?displayProperty=fullName>。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.MouseMove?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.MouseLeave?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.MouseEnter?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.MouseHover?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.MouseUp?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.MouseDown?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.DoubleClick?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Click?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabControl.TabPages%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage>

trans-unit.source: If there is at least one <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage> in the collection, and the user interacts with the tab control's header (where the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage> names appear), the TabControl raises the appropriate event.
trans-unit.target: 如果沒有至少一個<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage>在集合中，與使用者互動具有索引標籤控制項的標頭 (其中<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage>名稱會出現)，TabControl 引發適當的事件。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage>

trans-unit.source: However, if the user interaction is within the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ClientRectangle%2A> of the tab page, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage> raises the appropriate event.
trans-unit.target: 不過，如果使用者互動之內<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ClientRectangle%2A>的索引標籤頁，<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage>引發適當的事件。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ClientRectangle%2A>

trans-unit.source: Controls contained in a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage> are not created until the tab page is shown, and any data bindings in these controls are not activated until the tab page is shown.
trans-unit.target: 所包含的控制項<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage>不會顯示索引標籤頁面，並在這些控制項中的任何資料繫結不會啟動，直到索引標籤頁面會顯示在之前建立。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage>

trans-unit.source: When visual styles are enabled, and the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabControl.Alignment%2A> property is set to a value other than <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabAlignment>, the tab contents might not render correctly.
trans-unit.target: 當啟用視覺化樣式時，而<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabControl.Alignment%2A>以外屬性設定為值<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabAlignment>，內容可能無法正確呈現。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabAlignment> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabControl.Alignment%2A>

trans-unit.source: To work around this issue, you can paint the tab contents yourself using owner drawing.
trans-unit.target: 若要解決此問題，您可以繪製索引標籤內容自行使用主控描繪。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [How to: Display Side-Aligned Tabs with TabControl](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[How to︰ 使用 TabControl Display Side-Aligned 索引標籤](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。

trans-unit.source: When the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabControl.Alignment%2A> property is set to a value other than <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabAlignment> and the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabControl.Appearance%2A> property is set to a value other than <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabAppearance>, the tab page contents might not render correctly.
trans-unit.target: 當<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabControl.Alignment%2A>以外屬性設定為值<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabAlignment>和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabControl.Appearance%2A>以外屬性設定為值<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabAppearance>，索引標籤頁面內容可能無法正確呈現。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabAppearance> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabControl.Appearance%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabAlignment> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabControl.Alignment%2A>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.TabControl"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新執行個體<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.TabControl"></xref>類別。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the area of the control (for example, along the top) where the tabs are aligned.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定索引標籤對齊的位置 （例如，沿著上方） 控制項的區域。

trans-unit.source: When the Alignment property is set to <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabAlignment> or <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabAlignment>, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabControl.Multiline%2A> property is automatically set to `true`.
trans-unit.target: 當 [對齊] 屬性設定為<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabAlignment>或<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabAlignment>、<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabControl.Multiline%2A>屬性會自動設定為`true`。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabControl.Multiline%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabAlignment> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabAlignment>

trans-unit.source: When you set the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabControl.Appearance%2A> property to <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabAppearance>, it only appears as such when the Alignment property is set to <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabAlignment>.
trans-unit.target: 當您設定<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabControl.Appearance%2A>屬性，<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabAppearance>它時才會出現在這種情況的對齊屬性設定為<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabAlignment>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabAlignment> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabAppearance> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabControl.Appearance%2A>

trans-unit.source: Otherwise, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabControl.Appearance%2A> property displays as if set to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabAppearance> value.
trans-unit.target: 否則，<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabControl.Appearance%2A>屬性的顯示方式如同設定為<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabAppearance>值。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabAppearance> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabControl.Appearance%2A>

trans-unit.source: When you set the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabControl.Appearance%2A> property to <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabAppearance>, you must also set the Alignment property to <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabAlignment> so that the buttons display correctly.
trans-unit.target: 當您將<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabControl.Appearance%2A>屬性<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabAppearance>，您也必須將 [對齊] 屬性設<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabAlignment>，以便正確顯示按鈕。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabAlignment> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabAppearance> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabControl.Appearance%2A>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > When you set the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabControl.Appearance%2A> property to `Buttons`, you must also set the Alignment property to `Top` so that the tab page contents display correctly.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > 設定時，<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabControl.Appearance%2A>屬性`Buttons`，您也必須將 [對齊] 屬性設`Top`，以便正確顯示索引標籤頁面內容。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabControl.Appearance%2A>

trans-unit.source: Additionally, when visual styles are enabled, and the Alignment property is set to a value other than <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabAlignment>, the tab contents may not render correctly.
trans-unit.target: 此外，已啟用視覺化樣式，，和 [對齊] 屬性設為值以外<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabAlignment>，內容可能無法正確呈現。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabAlignment>

trans-unit.source: One of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.TabAlignment"></xref> values.
trans-unit.target: 其中一個<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.TabAlignment"></xref>值。

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_Top" name="Top" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 預設值是<xref uid="langword_csharp_Top" name="Top" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The property value is not a valid <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.TabAlignment"></xref> value.
trans-unit.target: 屬性值不是有效<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.TabAlignment"></xref>值。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the visual appearance of the control's tabs.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定控制項的索引標籤的視覺外觀。

trans-unit.source: When you set the Appearance property to `FlatButtons`, it only appears as such when the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabControl.Alignment%2A> property is set to `Top`.
trans-unit.target: 當您設定外觀屬性為`FlatButtons`，它只會顯示為這類時<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabControl.Alignment%2A>屬性設定為`Top`。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabControl.Alignment%2A>

trans-unit.source: Otherwise, the Appearance property appears as if set to the `Buttons` value.
trans-unit.target: 否則，會顯示外觀屬性如同設`Buttons`值。

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > When you set the Appearance property to `Buttons`, you must also set the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabControl.Alignment%2A> property to `Top` so that the tab page contents display correctly.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > 設定外觀屬性為`Buttons`，您也必須設定<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabControl.Alignment%2A>屬性`Top`，以便正確顯示索引標籤頁面內容。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabControl.Alignment%2A>

trans-unit.source: One of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.TabAppearance"></xref> values.
trans-unit.target: 其中一個<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.TabAppearance"></xref>值。

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_Normal" name="Normal" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 預設值是<xref uid="langword_csharp_Normal" name="Normal" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.target: 屬性值不是有效<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.TabAppearance"></xref>值。

trans-unit.target: 發生於取消選取索引標籤。

trans-unit.source: When the current tab changes in a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabControl>, the following events occur in the following order.
trans-unit.target: 當目前的索引標籤中變更時<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabControl>，依下列順序發生下列事件。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabControl>

trans-unit.source: Call this method during window-message preprocessing to determine whether the specified key is a regular input key that should be sent directly to the tab control or a special key (such as PAGE UP and PAGE DOWN) that should preprocessed.

trans-unit.target: 在後者的情況下，只有在前置處理階段沒有使用，來控制傳送索引鍵。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the size of the control's tabs.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定控制項的索引標籤的大小。

trans-unit.source: To change the <xref:System.Drawing.Size.Width%2A> property of the ItemSize property, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabControl.SizeMode%2A> property must be set to `Fixed`.
trans-unit.target: 若要變更<xref:System.Drawing.Size.Width%2A>ItemSize 屬性，屬性<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabControl.SizeMode%2A>屬性必須設定為`Fixed`。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabControl.SizeMode%2A> </xref:System.Drawing.Size.Width%2A>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Size"></xref> that represents the size of the tabs.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Size"> </xref>表示索引標籤的大小。

trans-unit.source: The default automatically sizes the tabs to fit the icons and labels on the tabs.
trans-unit.target: 預設值自動調整大小以符合索引標籤上的圖示與標籤的索引標籤。

trans-unit.source: The width or height of the <xref href="System.Drawing.Size"></xref> is less than 0.
trans-unit.target: 寬度或高度<xref href="System.Drawing.Size"></xref>小於 0。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether more than one row of tabs can be displayed.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定值，指出是否可以顯示多個資料列的索引標籤。

trans-unit.source: If Multiline is `false`, only one row of tabs is displayed, even if all the tabs do not fit in the available space.
trans-unit.target: 如果是多行`false`，只有一個資料列的索引標籤會顯示，即使不適合所有索引標籤中的可用空間。

trans-unit.source: In that case, however, arrows are displayed that enable the user to navigate to the undisplayed tabs.
trans-unit.target: 在此情況下，不過，箭頭會顯示可讓使用者瀏覽至未顯示索引標籤。

trans-unit.source: If the Multiline property is changed to `false` while the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabControl.Alignment%2A> property is set to `Left` or `Right`, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabControl.Alignment%2A> property is automatically reset to `Top`.
trans-unit.target: Multiline 屬性變更為`false`時<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabControl.Alignment%2A>屬性設定為`Left`或`Right`、<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabControl.Alignment%2A>屬性自動重設為`Top`。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabControl.Alignment%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabControl.Alignment%2A>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if more than one row of tabs can be displayed; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果可以顯示多個資料列的索引標籤。否則， <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 預設值是<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The following table describes how the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabControl> switches between the selected <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage> controls, depending on which keys are pressed.
trans-unit.target: 下表描述如何<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabControl>切換所選<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage>控制哪一個索引鍵已按下。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabControl>

trans-unit.source: |Key|Description| |---------|-----------------| |<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Keys> + <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Keys>|Selects the next <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage>.| |<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Keys> + <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Keys> + <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Keys>|Selects the previous <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage>.| |<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Keys> + <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Keys>|Selects the next <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage>.| |<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Keys> + <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Keys>|Selects the previous <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage>.|
trans-unit.target: |索引鍵 |描述 | |---------|-----------------| |<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Keys> + <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Keys>|選取 下一步<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage>。 | |<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Keys> + <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Keys> + <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Keys>|選取上一個<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage>。 | |<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Keys> + <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Keys>|選取 下一步<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage>。 | |<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Keys> + <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Keys>|Selects the previous <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage>.|</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage></xref:System.Windows.Forms.Keys></xref:System.Windows.Forms.Keys></xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage></xref:System.Windows.Forms.Keys></xref:System.Windows.Forms.Keys></xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage></xref:System.Windows.Forms.Keys></xref:System.Windows.Forms.Keys></xref:System.Windows.Forms.Keys></xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage></xref:System.Windows.Forms.Keys></xref:System.Windows.Forms.Keys>

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether right-to-left mirror placement is turned on.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定值，指出是否已開啟右到左的左右反轉位置。

trans-unit.source: The RightToLeftLayout property is primarily useful for developing forms for worldwide audiences.
trans-unit.target: RightToLeftLayout 屬性是主要用於開發為全球的對象的表單。

trans-unit.source: Many containers are designed so that controls are laid out in the container in a left-to-right fashion.
trans-unit.target: 許多容器的設計可讓控制項的配置容器中以左到右的方式。

trans-unit.source: These containers are compatible with languages that follow this writing direction.
trans-unit.target: 這些容器是以這個方向書寫的語言相容。

trans-unit.source: However, when you display the same containers to users of right-to-left languages, it is often preferable to reverse the order of the controls on the form.
trans-unit.target: 不過，當您從右至左語言的使用者顯示相同的容器，通常最好是在表單上控制項的順序互換。

trans-unit.source: If both the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.RightToLeftLayout%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.RightToLeft%2A> properties are `true`, mirroring will be turned on for the container and control placement and text flow will be right-to-left.
trans-unit.target: 如果兩個<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.RightToLeftLayout%2A>和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.RightToLeft%2A>屬性`true`鏡像將會開啟的容器和控制項的位置，文字會由右至左。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.RightToLeft%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.RightToLeftLayout%2A>

trans-unit.source: Changing the value of this property raises the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabControl.RightToLeftLayoutChanged> event.
trans-unit.target: 變更這個屬性的值會引發<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabControl.RightToLeftLayoutChanged>事件。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabControl.RightToLeftLayoutChanged>

trans-unit.source: For more information about globalization issues, see [Best Practices for Developing World-Ready Applications](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需全球化問題的詳細資訊，請參閱[開發世界性的應用程式的最佳作法](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。

trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果已開啟右到左的左右反轉位置。<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>表示標準子控制項的位置。
